title: LCQMC dataset is no longer open-sourced
body:
## Description
I'm running:
```
from data.classification import LCQMCTask
LCQMC = LCQMCTask()
print(len(LCQMC.dataset_train()[1]))
```
under scripts/bert
and it raise
```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/zechenw/Desktop/language_model/play.py", line 5, in <module>
    print(len(LCQMC.dataset_train()[1]))
  File "/Users/zechenw/Desktop/language_model/data/classification.py", line 75, in dataset_train
    return 'train', self.get_dataset(segment='train')
  File "/Users/zechenw/Desktop/language_model/data/classification.py", line 336, in get_dataset
    return BaiduErnieLCQMC(segment)
  File "/Users/zechenw/Desktop/language_model/data/baidu_ernie_data.py", line 159, in __init__
    field_indices=field_indices)
  File "/Users/zechenw/Desktop/language_model/data/baidu_ernie_data.py", line 47, in __init__
    super(_BaiduErnieDataset, self).__init__(filename, **kwargs)
  File "/Users/zechenw/Desktop/gluon-nlp/src/gluonnlp/data/dataset.py", line 134, in __init__
    super(TSVDataset, self).__init__(self._read())
  File "/Users/zechenw/Desktop/gluon-nlp/src/gluonnlp/data/dataset.py", line 153, in _read
    with io.open(filename, 'r', encoding=self._encoding) as fin:
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/Users/zechenw/.mxnet/datasets/baidu_ernie_data/task_data/lcqmc/train.tsv'

```
LCQMC is removed from task_data.tgz, and it requires application to the dataset owner. http://icrc.hitsz.edu.cn/info/1037/1146.htm
Should we remove the API?

### Error Message
(Paste the complete error message, including stack trace.)

## To Reproduce
(If you developed your own code, please provide a short script that reproduces the error. For existing examples, please provide link.)

### Steps to reproduce
(Paste the commands you ran that produced the error.)

## What have you tried to solve it?

1.
2.

## Environment

We recommend using our script for collecting the diagnositc information. Run the following command and paste the outputs below:
```
curl --retry 10 -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dmlc/gluon-nlp/master/tools/diagnose.py | python

```
